dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 2154 RH: To rename the Red River Valley Agricultural Research Center in Fargo, North Dakota, as the Edward T. Schafer Agricultural Research Center.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Cramer introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture
Reported with an amendment, referred to the House Calendar, and ordered to be printed
action.action-instruction: Strike out all after the enacting clause and insert the part printed in italic
For text of introduced bill, see copy of bill as introduced on April 26, 2017

form.official-title: To rename the Red River Valley Agricultural Research Center in Fargo, North Dakota, as the Edward T. Schafer Agricultural Research Center.

section.header: Renaming of the Red River Valley Agricultural Research Center in Fargo, North Dakota as the Edward T. Schafer Agricultural Research Center

subsection.text: The Red River Valley Agricultural Research Center in Fargo, North Dakota, shall hereafter be known and designated as the Edward T. Schafer Agricultural Research Center.

Any reference in any law, regulation, map, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be considered to be a reference to the Edward T. Schafer Agricultural Research Center.

endorsement.action-desc: Reported with an amendment, referred to the House Calendar, and ordered to be printed
